meanings.definition: Tautogs: a type of fish found in coastal waters.
meanings.sent1: The tautogs swam gracefully in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: We went fishing and caught some tautogs for dinner.
meanings.sent3: The tautogs decided to have a race to see who was the fastest swimmer.
meanings.sent4: The tautogs in the sea were like jewels in the water.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the colorful tautogs they saw at the aquarium.

meanings.definition: Tautogs: the plural form of tautog, referring to multiple fish of this species.
meanings.sent1: Look at all the tautogs swimming together in the reef.
meanings.sent2: The fishermen were excited to catch tautogs for their market stall.
meanings.sent3: The tautogs gathered for a group photo under the sea.
meanings.sent4: The school of tautogs moved in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent5: The tautogs shimmered like a silver wave in the sunlight.
